description: Relational databases, NoSQL, and data warehousing solutions

aws.name: Amazon RDS
aws.pricing_model: Pay per instance hour, storage, and data transfer

azure.name: Azure Database for MySQL/PostgreSQL/MariaDB
azure.pricing_model: Pay per vCore and storage with flexible and provisioned options

migration_notes: Azure offers separate services for each database engine (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MariaDB)
Azure Database flexible server provides more control than single server
Built-in high availability with zone-redundant options
Azure Database Migration Service for schema and data migration
Connection pooling and read replicas available for scaling
learning_resources: RDS to Azure Database migration guide

aws.name: Amazon DynamoDB
aws.pricing_model: Pay per read/write capacity units or on-demand requests

azure.name: Azure Cosmos DB
azure.pricing_model: Pay per provisioned throughput (RU/s) and storage

migration_notes: Cosmos DB supports multiple APIs: SQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, Gremlin, Table
Global distribution with multi-region writes (DynamoDB Global Tables equivalent)
Five consistency levels vs DynamoDB's eventual and strong consistency
Request Units (RUs) vs Read/Write Capacity Units - different pricing model
Azure Cosmos DB Migration Tool for data transfer
learning_resources: DynamoDB to Cosmos DB migration guide

aws.name: Amazon Redshift
aws.pricing_model: Pay per node hour with reserved instance discounts

azure.name: Azure Synapse Analytics
azure.description: Analytics service that brings together data warehouse and big data
azure.pricing_model: Pay per data warehouse unit (DWU) or serverless on-demand

migration_notes: Azure Synapse combines data warehouse, data lake, and analytics workspaces
Supports both provisioned and serverless compute models
T-SQL compatibility for easier migration from Redshift
Integration with Azure Data Factory for ETL workflows
Built-in Apache Spark pools for big data processing

aws.name: Amazon ElastiCache
aws.description: In-memory caching service with Redis and Memcached
aws.pricing_model: Pay per node hour by instance type

azure.name: Azure Cache for Redis
azure.pricing_model: Pay per cache size and tier (Basic, Standard, Premium)

migration_notes: Azure Cache for Redis only supports Redis (no Memcached equivalent)
Premium tier offers Redis clustering and data persistence
VNet integration available for secure access
Built-in monitoring and alerting with Azure Monitor
Redis modules support in Premium tier for extended functionality
